calendar.title: Fortune Calendar
calendar.subtitle: Combining Eastern & Western fortune to find your important dates
calendar.pageSubtitle: Cross-analyze Eastern and Western fortune to find your important dates
calendar.bijeonDesc: A day when self-confidence rises! Great for leadership.
calendar.inseongDesc: Perfect for learning or getting advice.
calendar.jaeseongDesc: Favorable for money matters! Shopping, investing OK.
calendar.siksangDesc: Creativity boost! Great for planning, writing, art.
calendar.gwansalDesc: Watch out for bosses. Keep a low profile.
calendar.samhapDesc: Multiple fortunes align! Best for new beginnings.
calendar.yukhapDesc: Great for meeting people! Dates, networking recommended.
calendar.chungDesc: Conflicts likely. Watch your words, drive carefully!
calendar.cheoneulGwiinDesc: Best day to meet helpful people! Schedule interviews, meetings.
calendar.bestDayDesc: A rare day when Eastern & Western fortunes align perfectly! Ideal for weddings, contracts, starting business, major decisions.
calendar.goodDayDesc: A special day with multiple positive fortunes! Great for important decisions or new beginnings.
calendar.normalDayDesc: A regular day with balanced energies. Proceed with routine activities.
calendar.badDayDesc: A day requiring caution. Consider postponing important decisions and get plenty of rest.
calendar.worstDayDesc: A day requiring extreme caution. Avoid important matters entirely and prioritize your health and safety.
